fields.label: Content Guide
fields.message:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<svg width="612px" height="199px" viewBox="0 0 612 199" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">
    <!-- Generator: Sketch 50.2 (55047) - http://www.bohemiancoding.com/sketch -->
    <title>Overview2</title>
    <desc>Created with Sketch.</desc>
    <defs>
        <path d="M0,0 L185,0 L185,69 L0,69 L0,0 Z" id="path-1"></path>
        <mask id="mask-2" maskContentUnits="userSpaceOnUse" maskUnits="objectBoundingBox" x="0" y="0" width="185" height="69" fill="white">
            <use xlink:href="#path-1"></use>
        </mask>
        <path d="M0.43626081,0.288007749 L42.5365711,0.288007749 L42.5365711,98.0226374 L0.43626081,98.0226374 L0.43626081,0.288007749 Z" id="path-3"></path>
        <mask id="mask-4" maskContentUnits="userSpaceOnUse" maskUnits="objectBoundingBox" x="0" y="0" width="42.1003102" height="97.7346296" fill="white">
            <use xlink:href="#path-3"></use>
        </mask>
        <path d="M0,0 L185,0 L185,69 L0,69 L0,0 Z" id="path-5"></path>
        <mask id="mask-6" maskContentUnits="userSpaceOnUse" maskUnits="objectBoundingBox" x="0" y="0" width="185" height="69" fill="white">
            <use xlink:href="#path-5"></use>
        </mask>
        <path d="M2,0.78162103 L44.8799456,0.78162103 L44.8799456,96.9378082 L2,96.9378082 L2,0.78162103 Z" id="path-7"></path>
        <mask id="mask-8" maskContentUnits="userSpaceOnUse" maskUnits="objectBoundingBox" x="0" y="0" width="42.8799456" height="96.1561871" fill="white">
            <use xlink:href="#path-7"></use>
        </mask>
    </defs>
    <g id="ACF-Message" stroke="none" stroke-width="1" fill="none" fill-rule="evenodd">
        <g id="Overview2" transform="translate(0.000000, -0.718750)">
            <g id="Left_Image" transform="translate(0.000000, 108.730469)">
                <use id="row2" stroke="#979797" mask="url(#mask-2)" stroke-width="2" fill="#FFFFFF" stroke-dasharray="2" xlink:href="#path-1"></use>
                <g id="inner_row" transform="translate(33.000000, 9.000000)">
                    <g id="image">
                        <rect id="imageL" stroke="#000000" fill="#4A90E2" x="0.85546875" y="0.5" width="52.6445312" height="49"></rect>
                        <path d="M52.5,1.76953125 L2.5,47.7695312" id="line2" stroke="#FFFFFF" stroke-linecap="square"></path>
                    </g>
                    <rect id="textR" stroke="#979797" fill="#D8D8D8" x="63.5" y="0.5" width="66.8613281" height="49"></rect>
                    <text id="text" font-family="OpenSans, Open Sans" font-size="9" font-weight="normal" letter-spacing="0.219999999" fill="#000000">
                        <tspan x="65.9394531" y="12.2089844">Text</tspan>
                    </text>
                    <text id="left" font-family="OpenSans, Open Sans" font-size="9" font-weight="normal" letter-spacing="0.219999999" fill="#FFFFFF">
                        <tspan x="3.7578125" y="12.2089844">Left</tspan>
                    </text>
                </g>
            </g>
            <g id="Left_Image-Copy" transform="translate(229.814111, 101.363277)">
                <use id="row2" stroke="#979797" mask="url(#mask-4)" stroke-width="2" fill="#FFFFFF" stroke-dasharray="2" xlink:href="#path-3"></use>
                <g id="inner_row" transform="translate(0.436261, 4.792129)">
                    <g id="image">
                        <rect id="imageL" stroke="#000000" fill="#4A90E2" x="0.777136012" y="0.5" width="40.8231742" height="39.9611021"></rect>
                        <path d="M40.9308572,1.449639 L1.94908844,39.1338529" id="line2" stroke="#FFFFFF" stroke-linecap="square"></path>
                    </g>
                    <rect id="textR" stroke="#979797" fill="#D8D8D8" x="0.5" y="47.9228759" width="41.1003102" height="39.9611021"></rect>
                </g>
            </g>
            <g id="Right_Image" transform="translate(0.000000, 32.617188)">
                <use id="row1" stroke="#979797" mask="url(#mask-6)" stroke-width="2" fill="#FFFFFF" stroke-dasharray="2" xlink:href="#path-5"></use>
                <g id="inner_row" transform="translate(86.000000, 33.000000) scale(-1, 1) translate(-86.000000, -33.000000) translate(21.000000, 8.000000)">
                    <g id="image" transform="translate(0.645508, 0.000000)">
                        <rect id="imageR" stroke="#000000" fill="#4A90E2" transform="translate(27.177734, 25.000000) scale(-1, 1) translate(-27.177734, -25.000000) " x="0.85546875" y="0.5" width="52.6445312" height="49"></rect>
                        <path d="M51.1455078,1.8828125 L1.14550781,47.8828125" id="line2" stroke="#FFFFFF" stroke-linecap="square" transform="translate(26.500000, 24.500000) scale(-1, 1) translate(-26.500000, -24.500000) "></path>
                    </g>
                    <rect id="textL" stroke="#979797" fill="#D8D8D8" transform="translate(96.168945, 25.000000) scale(-1, 1) translate(-96.168945, -25.000000) " x="63.6796875" y="0.5" width="64.9785156" height="49"></rect>
                    <text id="Text" transform="translate(112.625488, 8.822266) scale(-1, 1) translate(-112.625488, -8.822266) " font-family="OpenSans, Open Sans" font-size="9" font-weight="normal" letter-spacing="0.219999999" fill="#000000">
                        <tspan x="102.250977" y="12.3222656">Text</tspan>
                    </text>
                    <text id="Right" transform="translate(38.967773, 8.822266) scale(-1, 1) translate(-38.967773, -8.822266) " font-family="OpenSans, Open Sans" font-size="9" font-weight="normal" letter-spacing="0.219999999" fill="#FFFFFF">
                        <tspan x="27.3466797" y="12.3222656">Right</tspan>
                    </text>
                </g>
            </g>
            <g id="Right_Image-Copy" transform="translate(228.029576, 0.826172)">
                <use id="row1" stroke="#979797" mask="url(#mask-8)" stroke-width="2" fill="#FFFFFF" stroke-dasharray="2" xlink:href="#path-7"></use>
                <g id="inner_row" transform="translate(22.879946, 48.415332) scale(-1, 1) translate(-22.879946, -48.415332) translate(0.879946, 4.915332)">
                    <g id="image" transform="translate(0.123341, 0.684018)">
                        <rect id="imageR" stroke="#000000" fill="#4A90E2" transform="translate(21.188723, 20.480551) scale(-1, 1) translate(-21.188723, -20.480551) " x="0.777136012" y="0.5" width="40.8231742" height="39.9611021"></rect>
                        <path d="M39.8748472,1.5424415 L0.893078413,39.2266554" id="line2" stroke="#FFFFFF" stroke-linecap="square" transform="translate(20.660337, 20.070940) scale(-1, 1) translate(-20.660337, -20.070940) "></path>
                    </g>
                    <rect id="textL" stroke="#979797" fill="#D8D8D8" transform="translate(21.173496, 66.356985) scale(-1, 1) translate(-21.173496, -66.356985) " x="0.623340753" y="46.3764343" width="41.1003102" height="39.9611021"></rect>
                </g>
            </g>
            <text id="In-this-layout-the-i" font-family="OpenSans, Open Sans" font-size="13" font-weight="normal" letter-spacing="0.219999999" fill="#000000">
                <tspan x="303.226562" y="63.3261719">In this layout the image appears above the text in </tspan>
                <tspan x="303.226562" y="81.3261719">mobile but on desktop is oriented as shown. </tspan>
                <tspan x="303.226562" y="99.3261719">The layout is intended to add interest by </tspan>
                <tspan x="303.226562" y="117.326172">offsetting the image half of the row while </tspan>
                <tspan x="303.226562" y="135.326172">following page width guidelines. </tspan>
            </text>
        </g>
    </g>
</svg>

sub_fields.label: Select the option which matches the desired layout of this row.
sub_fields.name: image_placement
sub_fields.instructions: Choose the combination of options needed for this row. Section titles are optional.

sub_fields.label: Add square image
sub_fields.name: add_square
sub_fields.instructions:
Cropping is recommended for web performance. 
Square: 300 x 300

sub_fields.label: Add landscape image
sub_fields.name: add_landscape
sub_fields.instructions:
Cropping is recommended for web performance. 
Landscape: 450 x 300

sub_fields.label: Add portrait
sub_fields.name: add_portrait
sub_fields.instructions:
Cropping is recommended for web performance. 
Landscape: 300 x 380

sub_fields.label: Text content
sub_fields.name: mix_content
sub_fields.instructions: This is a flexible field, so feel free to mix buttons with text.

5aa6dc426b3e1.name: build_a_button
5aa6dc426b3e1.label: Build a button or button group

sub_fields.label: Add a button
sub_fields.name: add_button
sub_fields.instructions: This will appear on the same side as text content. Build out your content. Each thing you create can be reordered.

sub_fields.label: Internal link?
sub_fields.name: internal_link
sub_fields.instructions: Checked, this is created to make it possible for you to link to an internal page. Unchecked, please use an off-site link.

sub_fields.label: Button Link
sub_fields.name: button_link
sub_fields.instructions: Give the full URL as the link. When clicked the page will open on a new tab.

sub_fields.label: Button Title
sub_fields.name: button_title
sub_fields.instructions: For accessibility, please give the button a description. This is not the same as the label, and this text will appear when hovering on the button.
sub_fields.placeholder: Learn more about this exciting feature ...
